metadata.dc:author: Prasad, A
Piñerúa-Shuhaibar, L
Prieto-Rincón, D
Bonilla, E
Arrieta, A
metadata.dc:description: The authors reported an increased in the cerebrospinal fluid concentration of glutamine in seven paranoid schizophrenic patients. They found no changes in the levels of the remaining 20 free amino acids assayed.
metadata.dc:title: Esquizofrenia paranoide: aminoácidos libres en el líquido cefalorraquídeo.
[Paranoid schizophrenia: free amino acids in the cerebrospinal fluid].
